body_html: Hello all. I discovered that torch.backends.cudnn.version() returns None. This function used in <some object>.cuda(device_id=<num device>) call. I found that occured due incorect indents in function _libcudnn .\torch\backends\cudnn\__init__.py in lines 22 & 32

body: Hello all. I discovered that torch.backends.cudnn.version() returns None. This function used in \<some object\>.cuda(device_id=\<num device\>) call. I found that occured due incorect indents in function \_libcudnn .\torch\backends\cudnn\\\_\_init\_\_.py in lines 22 & 32
